comments.body:
Please add description to the function and the parameters.

Am I right that it decodes the bounding boxes (by applying the regression) and applies clipping?

The pattern:
```
context->allocate_temp(...)
SetZero<<<...>>>(...)
```
occurs >10 times, can we add a helper method for that?
Added a comment above, in essence it is the generated boxes that satisfy minimum size criteria
